articles.title: Newly identified saber-toothed cat is one of largest in history - EurekAlert
articles.description: A giant saber-toothed cat lived in North America between 5 million and 9 million years ago, weighing up to 900 pounds and hunting prey that likely weighed 1,000 to 2,000 pounds, scientists reported today in a new study.
articles.content:
IMAGE: Image of the humerus bone excavated from north central Oregon, which is now on display in the University of Oregon Museum of Natural and Cultural History.
